author: andschwa
body:
Unfortunately, our OMI work-around has been deprecated. I need to remove it to unblock the test runner.

/cc @paulcallen @palladia This okay?

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: For clarification this is Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.Omi, a module that utilizes the XML output of `omicli` to fake some DSC cmdlets.

comments.author: zach-folwick
comments.body: Perhaps when we remove, we should leave a separate branch somewhere with the Omi prototype for future demonstration purposes (wip/omi-prototype perhaps?).

title: Remove Commands.Omi
